name: Gamba
desc: A web application where restaurants can publish their recipes to have more visibility on social media, and users can save and prepare the original recipes from the restaurant.

name: Regira
desc: A web application for organizing team work. It allows creating projects and organizing tasks based on their priority, type, and status.

name: Conektin
desc: Web aplication that groups people into families, where besides meeting new people, users can create events to connect with new friendships.

name: Multigames
desc: A website to play different quick games to pass the time. You can choose between drawing a sprite or playing games like Memory with cats or the mythical Tic Tac Toe.
